title: 'Not for the ears of others': When Putin offered a lift to 'dear friend' PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Russian President Vladimir Putin engaged in an extended private discussion on Monday, taking place within Putin's Aurus limousine following the SCO summit. According to PTI reports, Putin offered Modi a ride, using the opportunity to continue their one-on-one talks for nearly an hour before their scheduled formal bilateral meeting.

title: 'Bid to flare tensions': BJP slams Trump aide Navarro's casteist jab
content: Peter Navarro accused India of indirectly funding Russia's war in Ukraine through discounted oil purchases, alleging that Brahmins are profiting at the expense of the Indian people. He criticized India's high tariffs, claiming they hurt American workers and taxpayers while indirectly funding the Russian war machine. Navarro also expressed optimism about trade negotiations with China.

title: Army dismantles TMC stage: Mamata urges force to not 'play into BJP's hands'
content: The Army dismantled a Trinamool Congress stage in Kolkata's Maidan, citing a violation of permit regulations regarding the duration of events in the area. Mamata Banerjee criticized the BJP, accusing them of using the Army, while urging the forces to remain neutral. TMC alleges political targeting and plans to relocate the protest.

title: Watch: What's key to success in politics? Gadkari's unique advise
content: Union minister Nitin Gadkari stated that honesty is challenging in politics, where deception can lead to leadership. Speaking at an event, he emphasized the importance of truth, non-violence, peace, humanity, and equality, drawing inspiration from Chakradhar Swami's teachings. Gadkari also highlighted the significance of values like honesty and dedication in society.

title: AI restructure at Meta: Wang’s memo to staff makes one thing clear - all report to him
content: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg is intensifying the AI race by reorganizing Meta Superintelligence Labs (MSL) into four specialized teams under Alexandr Wang's leadership. This restructuring aims to accelerate the pursuit of "personal superintelligence," consolidating research, product development, and infrastructure efforts. Key leaders like Nat Friedman and Aparna Ramani will play crucial roles in this ambitious endeavor.

title: 'I feel ashamed': Harbhajan on slapping Sreesanth; calls Lalit Modi 'selfish'
content: Lalit Modi stirred controversy by sharing an old video of the infamous IPL 'slapgate' incident between Harbhajan Singh and S. Sreesanth. Harbhajan expressed his disappointment, suggesting a selfish motive behind resurfacing the 18-year-old incident. He acknowledged his mistake, reiterated his regret, and mentioned seeking forgiveness.

title: Over 800 dead, thousands injured in Afghanistan quake; villages flattened
content: A devastating magnitude 6 earthquake struck eastern Afghanistan near the Pakistan border on Sunday, resulting in a tragic loss of over 800 lives and leaving approximately 2,500 individuals injured. The powerful tremors caused widespread destruction, leveling numerous villages and buildings in the affected region. Rescue operations are currently underway, with medical teams dispatched from neighbouring provinces and Kabul to provide assistance.

title: 'Habit of chori': Kharge targets PM Modi - predicts end of NDA rule soon
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge accused Prime Minister Narendra Modi of attempting to steal votes in the upcoming Bihar assembly elections. He asserted that the NDA's double-engine government would soon be ousted, replaced by a government representing the poor, backward communities, and Dalits. Kharge also criticized Bihar CM Nitish Kumar's alliance with the BJP-RSS, questioning his socialist principles.

title: Salesforce cuts 4,000 jobs: AI replace half of support staff; CEO flip-flops
content: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff announced a significant reduction of 4,000 customer support positions, a 45% decrease, as AI agents now handle 50% of customer interactions. This shift contrasts with Benioff's July statements, where he downplayed AI's potential for mass unemployment. The company is also utilizing AI to address a backlog of over 100 million uncalled sales leads.

title: 'Hydrogen bomb soon': Rahul hints new expose on 'vote chori'; BJP reacts
content: Rahul Gandhi, leader of opposition, has accused the BJP of "vote chori" and promised a new exposé, a "hydrogen bomb," following claims of similar electoral malpractices in Mahadevpura. He asserted that PM Modi would be unable to face the public after this revelation.

title: FIDE CEO slams Hikaru's claims of Carlsen Candidates favouritism
content: FIDE CEO Emil Sutovsky refuted Hikaru Nakamura's claims that the Candidates' rating qualification spot was designed for Magnus Carlsen's potential return. Sutovsky clarified that the rule has existed for years and now benefits top players like Nakamura. He emphasised the spot ensures the inclusion of the world's best, not specifically targeting Carlsen, whose return is deemed unlikely.

title: China's answer to Nvidia: How 2 brothers built Beijing's AI weapon; stocks up 1000%
content: Cambricon Technologies, a Chinese AI chip designer, has seen its stock price surge, positioning it as a strong domestic competitor to Nvidia. This growth is fueled by its software compatibility, making it easier to deploy AI models. With backing from Beijing and strategic partnerships, Cambricon aims to capture a significant share of China's AI chip market, reducing reliance on US.

title: GST collections hit Rs 1.86L cr; 6.5% increase YoY
content: Goods and Services Tax (GST) collections demonstrated a 6.5% year-over-year increase in August, reaching Rs 1.86 lakh crore, as per official government data. The preceding month saw even higher gross GST collections, totaling Rs 1.96 lakh crore.

title: Polish CEO row: US Open incident sparks outrage; company Drogbruk faces review-bombing
content: A video of Polish businessman Piotr Szczerek grabbing a signed cap intended for a young fan at the US Open sparked widespread outrage. The incident led to a review-bombing campaign against Szczerek's company, Drogbruk, severely damaging its online reputation.

title: Bengaluru man chases live-in partner’s car, douses her in petrol; sets her ablaze
content: In Bengaluru, a 35-year-old woman, Vanajakshi, tragically died after her live-in partner, Vithal, allegedly set her on fire following a history of domestic disputes. Vithal, a cab driver, was arrested after he intercepted a car Vanajakshi was traveling in, pouring petrol on her and the other occupants at a traffic signal.

title: Night to remember! Rinku finally talks about that unforgettable 5-six finish
content: Rinku Singh's five consecutive sixes in IPL 2023 against Gujarat Titans catapulted him to fame, significantly raising expectations and earning him immense love. He acknowledges the match gave him a unique identity, not just personally but for India. His consistent performance has secured him a place in India's Asia Cup 2025 squad, where they will face UAE, Pakistan and Oman.

title: Chargers vs Chiefs YouTube coverage: ESPN bans Jason Kelce
content: YouTube's pursuit of Jason Kelce for its exclusive Chargers-Chiefs broadcast in Brazil was thwarted by ESPN. Kelce, now an ESPN analyst, is restricted from appearing on competitor platforms like YouTube due to a new company policy. This decision marks a shift from last season, as ESPN tightens control over its on-air talent amid the rise of streaming in live sports.

title: India reduces US Treasury bill holdings! Gold up in forex reserves; check details
content: India is increasingly favoring gold over US Treasury bills to bolster its foreign exchange reserves, mirroring a global trend of diversifying away from dollar-denominated assets. While India's US T-bill holdings decreased to $227 billion in June 2025, its gold reserves rose significantly to 879.98 metric tonnes.

title: 'Was never desperate to play for India before': Karthik lauds youngster
content: Dinesh Karthik praises Jitesh Sharma's mindset regarding national team selection. Karthik helped Jitesh refine his finishing skills while at Royal Challengers Bengaluru. Jitesh's IPL 2025 performance earned him a spot back on the Indian squad. He aims to solidify his position in the upcoming Asia Cup 2025. Sanju Samson is currently the preferred wicketkeeper.

title: Trump blasts MLB chiefs in push for Roger Clemens Hall of Fame spot
content: Donald Trump wants Roger Clemens in the Baseball Hall of Fame. He urged Clemens to sue Major League Baseball. Trump highlighted Clemens' achievements and denied drug use allegations. He compared Clemens' situation to Pete Rose's case. Trump criticized MLB for delaying Rose's consideration. He emphasized talent should be the reason for Hall of Fame induction.

title: 20% ethanol blended petrol: SC dismisses PIL against nationwide rollout
content: The Supreme Court has dismissed a PIL challenging the nationwide implementation of 20% ethanol-blended petrol (E20). The petition requested that ethanol-free petrol be made available and that ethanol content be clearly labelled at fuel stations. The plea argued that older vehicles and some BS-VI models are not compatible with high ethanol blends, potentially causing damage and higher repair costs.

title: ICC unveils Women’s WC 2025 prize money; surpasses men’s edition
content: The ICC has announced a massive 297% increase in prize money for the 2025 Women's Cricket World Cup, totaling $13.88 million. This surpasses the 2023 Men's World Cup payout, signaling a major step towards gender pay parity. Winners will receive $4.48 million, a 239% jump from 2022.

title: Noida: Man shoots self during birthday party after breakup with girlfriend; critical
content: During a birthday celebration in Sector 134's JP Cosmos Society, Vikram Thakur, a 25-year-old unemployed car driver, allegedly shot himself in the head. The incident occurred around 2:15 am, leaving Vikram in critical condition at a private hospital.

title: Boulders fall on tourist vehicle on Kedarnath route after landslide; 2 dead
content: A landslide on the Kedarnath national highway near Munkatiya claimed the lives of two individuals and injured six others on Monday. The deceased, identified as Rita and Chandra Singh from Uttarkashi, were struck by falling debris. The injured, also from Uttarkashi, are receiving medical treatment.

title: Maharashtra: Woman ends life during video call with boyfriend
content: In Thane's Titwala area, a 23-year-old woman tragically died by suicide during a video call with her boyfriend. Police have detained him following accusations from her family of harassment, blackmail, and cheating other women. Allegedly, he took her jewellery and threatened to release private videos when she asked for its return, leading to her desperate act.

title: Asia Cup | Samson vs Jitesh debate ends! Ex-India cricketer gives verdict
content: As the Asia Cup 2025 approaches, debate intensifies over India's wicketkeeper. Aakash Chopra favors Sanju Samson, citing his impressive top-order T20 record with over 6,000 runs at a 140 strike rate. Samson's recent explosive form, including centuries against Bangladesh and South Africa, strengthens his case.

title: SCO member states condemn Pahalgam attack in Tianjin declaration; express condolences
content: The Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) strongly condemned the terrorist attack in Pahalgam on April 22, 2025, expressing condolences to the victims' families. The SCO reaffirmed its commitment to fighting terrorism, separatism, and extremism, emphasizing that perpetrators must face justice. Following the attack that killed 26, India launched Operation Sindoor, targeting terror hideouts across the border.

title: IPL Slapgate: Match referee breaks silence; calls Harbhajan a good friend
content: Farokh Engineer, the match referee during the infamous 'Slapgate' incident in the 2008 IPL, expressed surprise at the recent release of the footage. He emphasized maintaining confidentiality and believes the matter should remain in the past, as both Harbhajan Singh and S. Sreesanth have likely moved on. The resurfacing of the clip has stirred reactions, with Sreesanth's wife expressing disappointment and anger.

title: Megan McArthur retires from Nasa: First woman to pilot SpaceX Dragon retires
content: NASA astronaut Megan McArthur retires after two decades of remarkable contributions, including piloting the SpaceX Dragon and crucial work on the Hubble Space Telescope. McArthur's career highlights her technical expertise and leadership, notably as the final astronaut to operate Hubble with the space shuttle's robotic arm.

title: Florida’s 'Alligator Alcatraz' to close: Detention centre empties; judge orders shutdown
content: Florida's controversial immigration detention facility, "Alligator Alcatraz," is set to close following a federal judge's order, highlighting tensions between state and federal authorities. The facility, built rapidly in the Everglades, faced criticism over its remote location, alleged unsanitary conditions, and restricted access for families and lawyers.

title: 'Jee Le Zarra': Farhan Akhtar confirms film still on cards
content: Farhan Akhtar has clarified that 'Jee Le Zaraa,' initially planned with Priyanka Chopra, Alia Bhatt, and Katrina Kaif, is not shelved but is currently on hold. While he's unsure about the original cast's involvement and timing, Akhtar confirms the script and pre-production work are complete. Alia Bhatt also expressed optimism, citing scheduling conflicts as the primary challenge.

title: Ankita Lokhande mourns Pavitra Rishta co-star Priya Marathe’s demise
content: Television industry mourns the death of Priya Marathe. She died at 38 after fighting cancer. Ankita Lokhande, her Pavitra Rishta co-star, shared her grief. She posted old photos and remembered their bond. Usha Nadkarni also expressed sadness. She recalled Priya's quiet nature and dedication to work. The industry remembers a talented actress gone too soon.

title: Over 300 dead in Himachal as heavy rains trigger landslides, floods
content: Himachal Pradesh has been devastated by relentless monsoon rains since June 20, resulting in over 300 deaths and widespread destruction. Landslides, flash floods, and road blockages have crippled the state, severely impacting agriculture and pilgrimage routes. Authorities are focused on relief efforts as more heavy rainfall is expected, with schools closed and warnings issued.

title: Avneet Kaur reacts to trolling after Virat Kohli 'like controversy'
content: Actress Avneet Kaur addressed trolling in light of the Virat Kohli controversy, emphasizing the importance of family support in navigating online negativity. She acknowledged feeling low at times but highlighted her family's role in reminding her of her dreams and hard work. Kaur urged people to spread positivity and neutrality, advocating against putting others down while expressing opinions.

title: Silver price today: Silver hits record high; crosses Rs 1.24 lakh mark
content: Silver price today: Silver prices experienced a significant surge, climbing by Rs 2,597 to exceed Rs 1.24 lakh per kilogram in futures trading, mirroring strong global market performance. This surge was fueled by factors such as increased US tariffs on Indian products, a weakening rupee, and investors seeking safe-haven assets.

title: 'Stigma of rape on perpetrator, not survivor': Delhi HC chides rape accused
content: The Delhi High Court reprimanded an accused, imposing a ₹10,000 penalty for suggesting that dropping a rape case would protect the minor survivor from stigma.

title: Pakistan: Helicopter crashes in Diamer, at least five killed
content: A Pakistan government helicopter crashed in the Gilgit-Baltistan region during a test landing, resulting in the deaths of five people, including two pilots and three technicians. Initial reports suggest a technical fault caused the crash, leading to a fire. This incident follows similar helicopter crashes in recent months, raising concerns about aviation safety in the region.

title: Russia-India-China troika on display at SCO; PM Modi, Putin, Xi share warm moments
content: Prime Minister Modi, Russian President Putin, and Chinese President Xi Jinping displayed camaraderie at the SCO Summit 2025 in Tianjin, exchanging handshakes and hugs. Modi shared pictures of the interactions on X, emphasizing the importance of exchanging perspectives. Xi Jinping, in his banquet address, called for unity among SCO members to safeguard regional peace amid global uncertainties.

title: ‘Dark and fat’ taunts: Rajasthan man gets death for burning wife alive
content: In a shocking verdict, a Udaipur court sentenced Kishandas to death for the gruesome murder of his wife, Laxmi, in 2017. Kishandas, driven by disdain for Laxmi's appearance, tricked her into applying a flammable chemical before setting her ablaze. The court deemed the crime exceptionally heinous, warranting capital punishment to deter similar acts.

title: Career advice in tech era: Google cofounder to youngsters; embrace tech to be ‘more lazy’
content: Larry Page advised University of Michigan graduates in 2009 to leverage technology for efficiency, citing Google's scalable impact as an example. He emphasized that a small team can create software used by millions, contrasting it with the limitations of manual labor. Page's philosophy propelled Google from a startup to a $2.3 trillion tech giant.

title: Boys vs girls: NSS 2025 survey compares education spend
content: The National Statistics Office (NSO) has released findings from the Comprehensive Modular Survey: Education (CMS:E) 2025, highlighting gender-wise differences in education expenditure across India. The survey shows that boys' education expenses are consistently higher than girls' in both rural and urban areas, covering government and private schools. Spending on tuition fees, uniforms, transport, textbooks, and private coaching was examined, with urban averages significantly higher. The report provides detailed comparisons by level of enrolment and type of school.

title: Gold price prediction: What's the outlook this week - should you buy or sell?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold and silver prices are surging to new heights, fueled by expectations of a US Federal Reserve rate cut, geopolitical tensions, and a weaker rupee. Market volatility is anticipated this week due to a US holiday and upcoming economic data releases, including US jobs market figures and PMI numbers from major economies.

title: 'No double standards on terror': PM Modi's stern message to Pak at SCO; Sharif present
content: Addressing the SCO Summit in Tianjin, PM Modi urged a united global front against terrorism, emphasizing that no double standards are acceptable. He highlighted India's experience with terrorism and the need for consistent opposition to it.

title: Miami's Suárez appears to spit on Seattle staffer
content: Inter Miami forward Luis Suárez appeared to spit on a Seattle Sounders staffer after his team's 3-0 loss in the Leagues Cup final at Lumen Field on Sunday night.

title: 'Whatever it takes': Canes top Irish in showdown
content: Carter Davis made a 47-yard field goal, and No. 10 Miami came up with sacks on back-to-back plays to seal a win over No. 6 Notre Dame on Sunday night.

title: Sources: Isak to Liverpool in EPL-record transfer
content: Liverpool have agreed to a British-record deal to sign striker Alexander Isak from Newcastle United, sources have told ESPN.

title: Sources: Chiefs, McDuffie don't reach extension
content: The Chiefs and Trent McDuffie, their top cornerback, are not expected to agree to a multiyear contract extension before the start of the season.

title: Verlander earns win No. 265 with 121-pitch effort
content: Giants veteran Justin Verlander struck out 10 in five scoreless innings, throwing 121 pitches to earn the 265th win of his career.

title: Ten Hag fired by Leverkusen after just 3 games
content: Former Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag has been sacked by Bayer Leverkusen after just two games in charge, the club has confirmed.

title: QB Prescott glad 'solution' reached with Parsons
content: Dak Prescott said while he didn't expect the Micah Parsons trade, he was glad a solution was reached ahead of the season opener.

title: Djokovic into record-extending 64th major quarter
content: Novak Djokovic dominated qualifier Jan-Lennard Struff 6-3, 6-3, 6-2 on Sunday night at the US Open to reach his record-extending 64th Grand Slam quarterfinal.

title: 🏈 Fantasy football PPR rankings for Week 1
content: Weekly individual and composite rankings for each position in PPR and IDP formats, as well as Eric Karabell's superflex ranks.

title: Coco Gauff vs. Naomi Osaka: Who will win?
content: Naomi Osaka and Coco Gauff will meet in the fourth round on Monday night. And it's more of a toss-up than recent results suggest.

title: Let's preview the 2025 NFL season: Bold predictions, strengths and concerns for all 32 teams
content: Here's everything you need to know ahead of the NFL regular season, including how teams rank before Week 1.

title: Chaotic recruiting and 'harsh' decisions: Bill Belichick's first nine months at UNC
content: From enlightening and exhilarating to chaotic and tumultuous, there hasn't been anything boring about Belichick at UNC.

title: Week 1 showed us what we got right and wrong this offseason -- and we got plenty wrong
content: We might not be through the opening scenes, but we've already upended the Heisman race and slayed a giant.

title: LIVE Transfer deadline day news, updates: Isak to Liverpool agreed
content: The summer transfer window closes today and all the big Premier League clubs will be busy in some way. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Solak: The Packers needed Micah Parsons -- and here's how they should use him
content: Parsons could take Green Bay's defense to another level. Let's look at how he fits into Jeff Hafley's scheme.

title: Miranda Wang wins FM Championship by 1 over Jeeno Thitikul
content: Miranda Wang delivered clutch shots over the final three holes for a 2-under 70 and a one-shot victory over Jeeno Thitikul on Sunday in the FM Championship on Sunday.

title: WWE Clash in Paris results: Rollins keeps title, holds off Uso, Punk and Knight
content: Seth Rollins retained the World Heavyweight Championship against Jey Uso, CM Punk, and LA Knight, while John Cena beat Logan Paul at WWE Clash in Paris.

title: Clay makes his NFL season forecast: Picking the best offenses, top defenses and Super Bowl winner
content: Let's project the NFL's best -- and worst -- offenses and defenses. Plus, how do all 32 teams rank overall, and who will make the Super Bowl?

title: Guide to the rookie class: Who is flying under the radar? Who will win OROY, DROY?
content: Here's everything you need to know about this group of first-years, including Rookie of the Year front-runners.

title: Mike Clay's Playbook, Part 3: How to manage your team post-draft
content: The draft is just the beginning. Mike Clay gives you a guide to being a championship-winning manager.

title: Ramos, Olise join pantheon of singing soccer stars
content: It's been a wild few days in football -- not in terms of rumbling transfer sagas, VAR-related controversies or eyebrow-raising results, but in terms of a surprising amount of new music being released by active players.

title: The VAR Review: Fulham fume at disallowed goal while Man United get late penalty
content: Fulham were furious when Josh King's goal was ruled out at Chelsea, while Manchester United's late victory over Burnley came courtesy of a VAR penalty.

title: Norris' Dutch GP DNF makes the 2025 F1 title Piastri's to lose
content: Lando Norris' DNF at Sunday's Dutch GP may well be the decisive moment of the 2025 F1 season, when the title became Oscar Piastri's to lose.

title: Chase Briscoe captures second straight Southern 500
content: Chase Briscoe held off Tyler Reddick at Darlington Raceway on Sunday night and advanced to the second round of the NACAR Cup Series playoffs.

title: Lee Corso's farewell to 'GameDay': Behind the scenes of a football celebration﻿
content: Fans, many without tickets to the game, came from all over the country to Columbus to get a glimpse of Corso one last time.

title: From Collier to Clark and more: How injury returns could impact the playoffs
content: Napheesa Collier and Breanna Stewart are back, with more injured stars eyeing returns before the postseason.

title: NBA predictions: 10 teams that could exceed, fall short of ESPN's forecast
content: Too low on OKC? Too high on the Spurs? Tim Bontemps breaks down ESPN's Summer Forecast win predictions.

title: FSU's Tommy Castellanos trolls Alabama, sells 'Nick Can't Save Them' shirts
content: Castellanos made headlines after saying the legendary coach couldn't save the Tide from their matchup.

title: 'The Rich Eisen Show' on ESPN: How to listen and watch
content: 'The Rich Eisen Show' is joining forces with ESPN platforms! Find out how to get your weekday dose of pop culture and sports now.

title: Activist's "Muslim Right" Post After Javed Akhtar's Kolkata Event Postponed
content: Activist Shabnam Hashmi has come out in support of legendary poet-lyricist Javed Akhtar after a cultural event he was invited to was postponed due to objections by Muslim outfit Jamiat Ulema-e-Hind

title: 10 Luxury Cars, 3 Superbikes, Rs 13 Lakh Cash: Odisha Businessman Raided
content: The Endorcement Directorate (ED) during search operations on Sunday, seized 10 luxury vehicles and 3 super bikes from a Odisha-based businessman's home.

title: 2 More Die Of Rare Brain Infection In Kerala
content: Two people, including a three-month-old infant, have died from amoebic meningoencephalitis, a rare and often fatal brain infection, while undergoing treatment at Kozhikode Medical College Hospital, health officials said on Monday.

title: India Ranks Highest In Asia's Best Workplaces List With 48 Companies: Report
content: India ranks highest in great places to work in Asia, with 48 out of the top 100 organisations operating in India, a report said on Monday.

title: Putin Calls PM Modi 'Mahamahim Pradhanmantri', 'Priya Dost' At Bilateral Meet
content: PM Modi and Putin met for the first time after the US imposed 50 per cent tariffs on India over its Russian crude oil imports.

title: This Australian State Bans Fish-Shaped Soy Sauce Bottles
content: Plastic soy sauce bottles shaped like fish are tiny, cute and beloved by many sushi eaters. But in the state of South Australia, the decorative containers swam into a growing net of outlawed plastics.

title: Minutes Before PM-Putin Meet, US' "Defining Relationship" Signal To Delhi
content: A key member of US President Donald Trump's team has termed New Delhi-Washington DC ties a "defining relationship of the 21st century".

title: Flood Alert In Delhi After 29,000 Cusecs Of Water Released From Hathnikund Barrage
content: The Delhi government has issued a flood alert as the water level of the Yamuna River is expected to exceed the danger level after the release of 29,313 cusecs of water from Hathnikund Barrage on Monday morning.

title: "Milestone": Israel Doctors Remove Skull Base Tumour Through Eye Socket
content: Skull base tumours are abnormal growths located at the bottom of the skull, an area that houses critical structures such as the brainstem, cranial nerves, and major blood vessels.

title: UK's Queen Camilla Once Fought Off Attacker On Train With Her Shoe: New Book
content: Britain's Queen Camilla fought off a would-be attacker on a train when she was a teenager by hitting him with her shoe, according to a new book about the royal family.

title: 800 Killed, 2,500 Injured In 6.0 Earthquake In Afghanistan Near Pak Border
content: A massive rescue operation was underway in Afghanistan Monday, after a strong earthquake and multiple aftershocks flattened homes in a remote, mountainous region, killing more than 800 people, the Taliban authorities said.

title: Yogi Adityanath Assures Girl's Admission, Fulfills Her Dream Of Becoming Doctor At Janata Darshan
content: In a heartwarming gesture, Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath assured a young girl, Mayra, of admission to pursue her dream of becoming a doctor during a Janata Darshan on Monday.

title: Watch: Shubhanshu Shukla Takes A Spin In NASA's Crazy Space Trainer
content: Shubhanshu Shukla has given space fans a glimpse into the extreme physical challenges of astronaut training.

title: Maratha Quota Row: Protesters Disrupt Traffic, Crowd CSMT, South Mumbai
content: Hundreds of Maratha community members seeking quota gathered at the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CSMT) and other areas in south Mumbai on Monday, causing traffic congestion and inconvenience to commuters.

title: 11-Year-Old Shot Dead In Houston After Doorbell-Ringing Prank: Cops
content: An 11-year-old boy was fatally shot in Houston after a prank in which he rang the doorbell of a home and ran away, police said Sunday.

title: Opinion: Opinion | The 'Inner Circle' That Runs America, And Why It's Them India Needs To Court
content: Though Trump, with his laser focus on tariffs, has put almost every US relationship under strain, countries like Israel, China, and even Pakistan have weathered the storm. How?

title: "Humanity Wants An End To Russia-Ukraine Conflict," PM Modi Tells Putin In China
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi held bilateral talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin on the sidelines of the SCO summit in China on Monday. PM Modi told the Russian leader that humanity wants an end to the Russia-Ukraine conflict.

title: UPI Sees Record 20 Billion Transactions In August, Valued At Rs 24 Lakh Crore
content: In a significant development, the Unified Payments Interface (UPI) crossed 20 billion transactions in August for the first time in its history, the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) data showed on Monday.

title: Kerala Centre for Pest Management issues alert over pest infestations in Kuttanad paddy fields
content: Alert over white-backed planthopper, stemborer and leaf folder infestations in paddy fields in Kuttanad and other parts of Alappuzha

title: TUDA moots Operation Swarna to rescue, revive, rejuvenate River Swarnamukhi
content: The proposal is to have a task force headed by TUDA Vice-Chairman, with enough teeth and claws on the lines of Hyderabad’s HYDRAA

title: Sinister campaign against Dharmasthala is part of Congress conspiracy against majority in Karnataka: Union Minister Pralhad Joshi
content: BJP organises ‘Dharmasthala chalo’ to seek either NIA or CBI probe to uncover the larger conspiracy behind defaming Dharmasthala temple and its administrators

title: Elephant gores mahout to death at Haripad
content: Another is undergoing treatment after the elephant belonging to the Haripad Sree Subrahmanya Swamy temple attacks him

title: Online Gaming industry representatives meet IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw amid concerns about new legislation
content: The Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Act, 2025 effectively targets firms that offer fantasy sports and online card entailing the prospect of risking money.

title: Apply online for Deeksha Bhoomi Yatra 2025 on Karnataka government website
content: This annual pilgrimage to Nagpur in Maharashtra is organised to commemorate Pravartan Din, a significant day marking Dr. B.R. Ambedkar’s conversion to Buddhism

title: Cyberabad police arrests child kidnapping gang operating in and around Hyderabad; rescues six children
content: The gang kidnapped children them from railway stations and isolated areas, before selling them to childless couples through a network of associates

title: My rival not speaking, debate would take place if both candidates speak: INDIA bloc's V-P candidate
content: Sudershan Reddy said he favoured a healthy debate and that his intention is not to speak lowly about his rival

title: Remarks against PM Modi’s mother: BJP cadre burn Rahul Gandhi’s effigy in Tirupati
content: The party leaders led by TTD trust board member G. Bhanuprakash Reddy and BJP State spokesperson Jally Madhusudhan gathered at SGS Arts College junction and set the effigy afire

title: Ashok Leyland partners with China’s CALB Group, to invest over ₹5,000 crore for battery production
content: The partnership marks yet another milestone for Ashok Leyland and Hinduja Group’s ongoing commitment towards electrification, with investments across Electric Vehicles, Electric Mobility-as-a-Service, Charging Equipment, Vehicle Financing and Leasing, and other areas

title: PMK Disciplinary Action Committee submits recommendations in sealed cover to party founder Ramadoss
content: PMK MLA P. Arul said a meeting of the district secretaries and presidents had been scheduled on Tuesday (September 2), followed by the meeting of the party’s administrative committee on Wednesday (September 3)

title: Karnataka CM Siddaramaiah hands over CA sites in Mysuru to government departments
content: 23 sites were handed over to Chamundeshwari Electricity Supply Corporation (CESC), 11 each have been allotted to Backward Classes Welfare Department and Minorities Welfare Development

title: Mamata likely to participate in assembly discussion on 'attacks' on Bengali-speaking migrants
content: The ruling TMC will move a censure motion during the three-day special session in the assembly from September 1 to condemn the alleged attacks on Bengali migrants in states where the BJP is in power, Assembly Speaker Biman Banerjee said

title: Erode Corporation sterilises over 10,000 stray dogs; third phase under way
content: Under Article 243 (W) of the Indian Constitution, civic bodies are responsible for controlling the stray dog population through sterilisation and anti-rabies vaccination under the ABC programme

title: Dharmasthala case: Karnataka CM Siddaramaiah accuses BJP of doing politics, ‘won’t get any political benefit’
content: The CM questioned the BJP for not opposing setting up of SIT, but staging protest only after coming to know that no skeleton was found

title: ‘Hydrogen bomb’ of revelations on ‘vote chori’ coming, Modi will not be able to show his face, says Rahul Gandhi
content: Speaking at the concluding event of his ‘Voter Adhikar Yatra’ in Patna, Mr. Gandhi said Bihar is a revolutionary State and it had given a message to the country

title: Debris cleared from Nandyal’s Chinna Cheruvu
content: Volunteers of Mana Ooru - Mana Gudi - Mana Bhadyatha organisation had decided to clean garbage that gets accumulated after the immersion of Ganesh idols

title: Ready to provide humanitarian aid to those hit by Afghanistan quake: PM Modi
content: An earthquake in Afghanistan's east has killed at least 800 people, injured 2,500 and destroyed numerous villages, a spokesperson for the Taliban government said

title: Dharmasthala case: BJP chief B.Y. Vijayendra alleges ‘very big conspiracy,  wants probe to be given to NIA or CBI’
content: The BJP chief pointed out that Dakshina Kannada district in-charge Minister Dinesh Gundu Rao had claimed that there was a lot of pressure from leftist groups for an investigation, and Deputy CM D. K. Shivakumar has said that there is a big conspiracy in the Dharmasthala episode

title: Three killed as car rams stationary bus on Tiruchi-Chennai National Highway at Siruganur
content: Police sources said the car was on its way to Chennai from Tenkasi when the fatal accident occurred at around 1.30 a.m.

title: Low pressure likely over north Bay of Bengal, to trigger rainfall in several West Bengal districts: IMD
content: The IMD said thunderstorms accompanied by lightning and winds reaching speeds of 30–40 kmph are likely to occur at one or two places over all districts of south Bengal during the next two days

title: OpenAI plans India data centre with at least 1 gigawatt capacity: Report
content: OpenAI, backed by Microsoft, has formally registered as a legal entity in India and has begun building a local team

title: SC dismisses plea challenging nationwide rollout of 20% ethanol-blended petrol
content: The Union government apprised the top court that the policy served national interests by supporting farmers and reducing import dependence

title: Supreme Court rejects plea against construction of new passenger jetty at Gateway of India
content: The Bombay High Court on July 15 had dismissed three petitions challenging the construction of the ₹229 crore passenger jetty and terminal facility proposed by the Maharashtra Maritime Board (MMB) near the Gateway of India

title: PM Modi departs for home after concluding ‘productive’ China visit
content: The Prime Minister, who was in China on the final leg of his two-nation visit, said in a social media post that he emphasised India’s stand on “key global issues” in Tianjin

title: Irrational exuberance, Trump tariff shock not reflected: Congress on 1st quarter GDP numbers
content: Sales growth in the manufacturing sector, as opposed to profits growth, has continued to slow down, Jairam Ramesh said.

title: Committee formed for formulation of ‘Telangana Education Policy’
content: Its terms of reference include aligning education frameworks with emerging job markets, skills and global opportunities

title: With Bairabi-Sairang new line set to open, Mizoram expects massive changes in connectivity
content: The 51.38-km new line built at ₹5,021 cr. comprises 48 tunnels, 55 major bridges, 87 minor bridges, five RoBs, and six RuBs

title: Reservoirs across Andhra Pradesh witness heavy inflows; APSDMA warns of heavy rains, strong winds; fishermen advised to stay ashore
content: Srikakulam, Vizianagaram, Parvathipuram Manyam, and Alluri Sitharama Raju districts are expected to receive moderate to heavy rainfall on September 1

title: Conservancy workers to get same salary until disposal of industrial dispute, Chennai Corporation tells Madras High Court
content: Advocate General P.S. Raman says the GCC had a meeting with the private concessionaire on Saturday and the latter agreed to pay the same salary to the absorbed workers

title: Road accidents in India: Over-speeding leading cause of road accident deaths in 2023
content: Road accidents have become more severe, two-wheelers continue to dominate as crime vehicles and victim vehicles.

title: PM Modi meets President Putin; calls for ending Ukraine conflict as soon as possible
content: Narendra Modi and Vladimir Putin held talks on the margins of the annual summit of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) in this Chinese port city.

title: Madras High Court sets aside 10-year sentence of South African woman in cocaine smuggling case after 8 years in jail
content: NCB had intercepted the 62-year-old at Chennai airport in 2017 when she flew down from Brazil via Abu Dhabi after swallowing 81 capsules of cocaine

title: Supreme Court asks Calcutta HC to crack down on illegal constructions in larger public interest
content: The top court dismissed a plea by a construction firm challenging a Calcutta High Court order that had directed the demolition of unauthorised portions of a building

title: Andhra Pradesh Government will ensure pensions for all eligible persons: Kondapalli Srinivas
content: Kondapalli Srinivas formally distributed monthly pensions to beneficiaries in K. Krishnapuram village of Dattirajeru mandal of Vizianagaram district

title: RCB says it’s working closely with BCCI, stadiums to design better crowd management
content: RCB announced a compensation of ₹25 lakh each to the eleven people who died in the stampede outside the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium on June 4

title: Nitish Katara murder case: Supreme Court extends interim bail of convict Vikas Yadav
content: Vikas Yadav is the son of Uttar Pradesh politician D P Yadav; his cousin Vishal Yadav was also punished for the kidnapping and murder of business executive Katara

title: Man electrocuted to death while adjusting Ganesh idol banner in Hyderabad
content: Bharat died instantly when a rod he extended came in contact with an 11 kV power line. He is survived by his wife and three children.

title: Allahabad High Court to hear Rahul Gandhi's petition on September 3
content: The Special Judge MP-MLA in Varanasi had remanded the matter to the ACJM court seeking registration of an FIR against Rahul Gandhi on his 2024 statement on Sikhs in America

title: ‘Gandhi se Ambedkar’ march marking culmination of ‘Vote Adhikar Yatra’ in Bihar begins
content: The march started with the INDIA bloc leaders offering floral tributes at the statue of Mahatma Gandhi

title: Government working on legally sustainable solution: Minister on Maratha quota row
content: Vikhe Patil, who heads a cabinet sub-committee on the Maratha reservation issue, met Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis on August 31 night to discuss the situation.

title: Amoebic meningoencephalitis claims two more lives
content: An infant and a middle aged woman passed away at Government Medical College Hospital in Kozhikode on Sunday

title: SC upholds Telangana's domicile rules for admissions in medical colleges under State quota
content: The impugned rules entitled only those students who have studied for the last four years up to Class 12 in the State to get admission in the medical and dental colleges under the State quota.

title: Karnataka secures spot in National Quantum Mission Board
content: State Government designates Ekrup Caur, Secretary in the Department of Information Technology and Bio Technology (ITBT), as the nodal officer for the Hub Governing Board (HGB) of the National Quantum Mission (NQM)

title: Amit Shah speaks to Punjab Governor, CM; takes stock of flood situation
content: During the telephonic conversations, the Governor and the Chief Minister briefed the Home Minister about the prevailing situation and the steps taken by the administration for the rescue and relief of the people affected

title: Commercial LPG prices slashed by ₹51.50 from September 1; no change in domestic cylinder rates
content: In Kolkata, Mumbai and Chennai, commercial LPG prices will be revised down to ₹1,684, ₹1,531.5, and ₹1,738, respectively, according to the Indian Oil Corporation

title: Chennai Corporation to purchase temple land for ₹18.85 crore to run a school after Madras High Court intervention
content: Justice N. Anand Venkatesh had fixed the consideration and persuaded the corporation as well as the temple to agree for a settlement in the interest of 2,500 students

title: Infiltration bid by terrorists foiled along LoC in J&K’s Poonch
content: The infiltration attempt coincided with the visit of Union Home Minister Amit Shah to the winter capital Jammu to assess the situation in the aftermath of the heavy rain and flash floods

title: 'Cowardly kowtowing': Congress slams government after Modi-Xi talks
content: The Congress also termed as "anti-national" Modi's silence on Pakistan-China "jugalbandi" during Operation Sindoor.

title: Home-grown innovations: KabadiMan rides to Belagavi Tech Meet 2025 on Hoopoe Electric
content: The event brought together entrepreneurs, corporate leaders, and innovators to underline how tier-2 cities, like Belagavi, are driving meaningful technological change and creating solutions with global relevance

title: India rains LIVE: Three killed in landslips as heavy rains wreak havoc in Shimla; Amit Shah chairs high-level meeting on relief measures in Jammu
content: “Union Home Minister Amit Shah visited the flood-hit areas of Jammu,” officials said. Accompanied by Lt. Governor Manoj Sinha and Chief Minister Omar Abdullah, Mr. Shah stopped on the Tawi bridge near Bikram Chowk and inspected the damage along the riverbanks

title: Bihar SIR hearing highlights: ECI to accept claims and objections beyond September 1, SC told
content: The parties have urged the Court to direct the Election Commission of India (ECI) to extend the last date for receiving claims and objections to September 15, 2025

title: PM Modi at SCO summit: ‘No double standards on terrorism will be acceptable’
content: PM Modi said India’s policy regarding the bloc was based on three pillars: security, connectivity, and opportunity.

title: India's MPL to sack 60% of local staff after paid gaming ban, source says
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's government this month banned online paid games, citing financial and addiction risks especially among youth, leading to a shutdown of many gaming apps

title: Maratha quota stir Day 4: Jarange gives up water, protesters disrupt traffic in south Mumbai
content: With the deadlock continuing, Maharashtra Minister Radhakrishna Vikhe Patil said the government was working on a solution to the Maratha quota issue which will stand in the court of law

title: ‘Brahmins profiteering off Indian people’: White House trade adviser Peter Navarro
content: His remarks followed Prime Minister Modi's bilateral engagement with Chinese President Xi Jinping on Sunday, August 31, on the sidelines of the SCO leaders' summit

title: The importance of India’s federal design | Explained
content: What is the status of the demand to restore statehood to Jammu and Kashmir? What are the processes enshrined in the Constitution of India for creating States? How are States reorganised? Have Legislative Assembly elections been held in J&K?

title: Red alert for extremely heavy rains in several Himachal Pradesh districts till September 2
content: The state received 440.8 mm of rainfall against the season's average of 256.8 mm; the excess was more than 100% in five districts

title: Accused in Kannapuram blast case remanded
content: Investigators said that Anoop, a businessman, had no political connections, contrary to the allegations of the CPI(M) and the Congress

title: Telangana Weather September 1 | Heavy rain likely in seven districts
content: The seven districts under heavy rain alert are Kumaram Bheem Asifabad, Mancherial, Nirmal, Peddapalli, Jayashankar Bhupalpally, Mulugu and Bhadradri Kothagudem

title: Start early, reach safely: Hyderabad police on Ganesh idol immersions
content: Police appealed to the organisers to reinstate the earlier practice of starting processions early in the morning and completing them by evening, so that devotees can return home early and safely

title: Australian government invites Lokesh to take part in its Special Visits Programme
content: The invite is in appreciation of Andhra Pradesh’s leadership in the fields of human resources, technology, and economic development

title: Shortage of trains, high bus fares disrupt Keralites’ travel plans
content: Passengers demand more special trains and KSRTC inter-State buses, to destinations like Bengaluru and Chennai, during the festival season

title: Karnataka Minister Priyank Kharge meets Poland’s Deputy Prime Minister to strengthen technological ties
content: Karnataka’s Minister for Rural Development & Panchayat Raj and Information Technology Priyank Kharge met Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Digital Affairs of Poland Krzysztof Gawkowski, during his official visit to Poland

title: Police, excise step up vigil to curb flow of drugs, liquor
content: Searches are being carried out at railway stations in the city and suburbs in view of the Onam season; Excise dept. readies two units of ‘striking force’ to deal with emergency situations

title: India Post suspends mail operations to U.S. in absence of rule clarity
content: The Department of Posts says it is closely monitoring the situation and making every effort to restore services at the earliest

title: Issue GR on Maratha quota on available records, says Jarange
content: “We won’t budge from the protest venue till demands are met even if the Fadnavis government fires bullets at us,” Mr. Jarange said

title: Bengaluru: Knife-wielding man sexually harasses, robs woman in PG accommodation
content: The victim was sleeping in her room and her roommate had gone out when the alleged incident took place

title: 'Insightful conversations': PM Modi, Putin travel in same car to the venue
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports .

title: Bihar SIR: SC says confusion over exercise 'largely trust issue'
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .

title: 'Blatant interference by Russia': EU chief's plane hit by GPS jamming
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, providing a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers .

title: A's monitor Kurtz; Chourio returns for Brewers with homer
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the last slate of the month gets an early start with a 12:10 p.m. ET affair at Great American Ballpark .

title: Ben Shelton and Trinity Rodman relationship timeline: Shelton on hand at Rodman's match against Chicago
content: Ben Shelton and Trinity Rodman revealed they had been dating on social media in march . they've shown up for each other in a big way, including at each other's matches . the 2023 semifinalist returned the flavor by appearing at the Washington Spirit's match .

title: 'No days off': Inside the pillars of Patriots' Mike Vrabel's hands-on coaching style
content: a former linebacker who became a head coach emerged with a bloody cut on his cheek . he was hired as the 16th head coach in the Patriots history in january . the former nfl player was tangled up with an defender on the ground during a practice .

title: The game is on the line: Which WNBA player gets the last shot?
content: nneka Ogwumike's clutch bucket at the buzzer gives the Storm an 84-82 win over the Mystics . sports experts contend there's no such thing as a consistent clutch player in any sport . who are the biggest clutch shooters in the WNBA, when a game is on the line .

title: Simulating the entire season: The biggest storylines from one possible outcome
content: pat McAfee offers high praise for Kyle Hamilton after the safety signed an extension with the Ravens . we're doing a single simulation from ESPN's Football Power Index . this is not my prediction or ESPN Analytics' prediction of how this season will unfold .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 1
content: "the days of a national champion being undefeated are over," coach Steve Sarkisian says . the longhorns aren't alone, but the early results shook up the playoff pecking order . here's what the selection committee's top 12 would look like if it were released today .

title: Who has a shot at the championship? Projecting conference and Finals winners
content: this season, the Oklahoma City Thunder will look to become the first back-to-back champions since 2018 . but there will be plenty of challengers . the new york Knicks have plenty of postseason experience to push even fury .

title: Szoboszlai, Liverpool make statement start to 2025-26 in win over Arsenal
content: Dominik Szoboszlai scores one of the greatest free kicks in premier league history . the german beat arsenal keeper David Raya from 30 yards with a powerful right-footed strike in the 83rd minute . arsenal had controlled the game without being able to create clear chances .

title: PLL semifinals preview: Stats, matchups, how to watch
content: the 2025 premier lacrosse league playoffs continue this weekend on ESPN . the four teams travel to Subaru Park outside of Philadelphia for the semifinals . sports analyst Quint Kessenich revealed his keys to both matches . he will move ahead of casey Powel with four points .
